CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PDTP - DTBT solution showed two prominent absorption maxima at 450 and 671 nm , while PDTP-BT and PDTP-DT2BT solutions demonstrated two main absorption maxima at 413 and 711 nm and at 480 and 603 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PDTP - This is the name of a material, so it is a Material Name entity.
2. DTBT - This is also the name of a material, so it is a Material Name entity.
3. PDTP-BT - This is a modified version of PDTP, so it is also a Material Name entity.
4. PDTP-DT2BT - This is another modified version of PDTP, and it is also a Material Name entity.

Therefore, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PDTP
2. DTBT
3. PDTP-BT
4. PDTP-DT2BT
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. PDTP
2. DTBT

So, the two Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PDTP
2. DTBT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTBT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PDTP - DTBT solution showed two prominent absorption maxima at 450 and 671 nm , while PDTP-BT and PDTP-DT2BT solutions demonstrated two main absorption maxima at 413 and 711 nm and at 480 and 603 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PDTP
2. DTBT
3. PDTP-BT
4. PDTP-DT2BT

These are the different names of the properties or substances being referred to in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties:

1. PDTP
2. DTBT

These are the names of the materials being referred to in the paragraph, and they are the only entities that clearly refer to Material Properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTBT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PDTP - DTBT solution showed two prominent absorption maxima at 450 and 671 nm , while PDTP-BT and PDTP-DT2BT solutions demonstrated two main absorption maxima at 413 and 711 nm and at 480 and 603 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. PDTP - DTBT: This is a solution that exhibits two prominent absorption maxima at 450 and 671 nm.
2. PDTP-BT: This is a solution that demonstrates two main absorption maxima at 413 and 711 nm.
3. PDTP-DT2BT: This is a solution that shows two main absorption maxima at 480 and 603 nm.

In each case, the "Property Value" entity is the value of a specific property (absorption maximum wavelength) of the solution.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of a material property:

1. PDTP - DTBT: This is a solution that exhibits two prominent absorption maxima at 450 and 671 nm.
2. PDTP-BT: This is a solution that demonstrates two main absorption maxima at 413 and 711 nm.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of a material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of a material property, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 450 nm |
| 671 nm |
| 413 nm |
| 711 nm |
| 480 nm |
| 603 nm |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
